name: Park JunYoung
introduction: As a developer, I believe that learning the latest trends is not just an option but a necessity. Writing efficient and maintainable code in a rapidly changing technological environment is a key element for the success and sustainable growth of any project. To achieve this, I actively utilize Notion and Gitbook, aiming for systematic knowledge management and code quality improvement. These efforts help me build my own development philosophy and contribute to the growth of the team.
